meanings.sent1: The school sent out letters to all the acceptees.
meanings.sent2: The acceptees were thrilled to receive their invitations.
meanings.sent3: The acceptees formed a happy group, celebrating their success.
meanings.sent4: The acceptees were like stars shining brightly in the sky of opportunities.
meanings.sent5: The acceptees proudly wore their acceptance letters like badges of honor.

meanings.definition: acceptees: those who are accepted or received
meanings.sent1: The company welcomed the new acceptees with open arms.
meanings.sent2: The acceptees gathered together to share their excitement.
meanings.sent3: The acceptees were like a bouquet of flowers, each bringing unique qualities.
meanings.sent4: The acceptees were like puzzle pieces fitting perfectly into the team.
meanings.sent5: The acceptees felt a sense of belonging among their peers.
